name: The Jonathan Bryant Retrospective
description:
http://www.jonathanbryant.net/

https://twitter.com/JBryMcfly/

"The Jonathan Bryant Retrospective was a mistake"

-Jonathan Bryant, 2016

A compilation featuring 5 Personal Computer experiences and 3 Virtual Worlds (Built using Steam VR). Most of these projects were incompleted over separate weekends.

These were all created by your's truly, from the programming all the way to the art. They are at various levels of what you may call a "Game" but they were designed to help me learn new things throughout my student years.

A donation to this developer is money wasted.
